movies.title: The Wizard of Oz
movies.description: Dorothy Gale is swept away from a farm in Kansas to a magical land of Oz in a tornado and embarks on a quest with her new friends to see the Wizard who can help her return home to Kansas and help her friends as well.

movies.title: Jaws
movies.description: When a killer shark unleashes chaos on a beach resort, it's up to a local sheriff, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer to hunt the beast down

movies.title: The Terminator
movies.description: A seemingly indestructible android is sent from 2029 to 1984 to assassinate a waitress, whose unborn son will lead humanity in a war against the machines, while a soldier from that war is sent to protect her at all costs.

movies.title: Beauty and the Beast
movies.description: A selfish prince is cursed to become a monster for the rest of his life, unless he learns to fall in love with a beautiful young woman he keeps prisoner.

movies.title: Groundhog Day
movies.description: A weatherman finds himself inexplicably living the same day over and over again.
